p: IL-1β is a multifactorial cytokine that is able to activate many cell types with potent inflammatory features. The wide biological effects of IL-1β play a central role in the regulation of many different genes. IL-1β affects approximately 90 genes that occur during inflammation that spread in the gingival connective tissue and lead to the occurrence of attachment loss and alveolar bone destruction due to its enhanced effect on osteoclastogenesis [ 30].
